name: Sequinox: Starlight Racers
description:
(I am aware that, in the Web Version, when you start a race, the racers fall through the floor and respawn. I have no idea what causes that and it doesn't happen in the standalone version. Also, I noticed that, at least on my own setup, having a Youtube video open caused the frame rate to stutter, but your mileage may vary.)

[Depending on your keyboard, you may run into some Dropped Inputs. This is caused by the actual hardware you're working with. Most keyboards can only handle about 3-6 keys pressed at a time. I recommend using some gamepads, or maybe even multiple USB keyboards (though you still need to make sure that each player is using Different Keys, because Unity can't differentiate between the Keyboards.)]

Sequinox! Start Your Engines!

Grab 1-3 of your friends/acquaintances/enemies/trustworthy strangers and face off on the track! That's right! It's a Kart-Racing Game based on your favorite Magical Girl Actual Play Podcast, Sequinox!

6 Playable Racers!

More Racers than you can have in a race at once, and each has different stats! Choose your favorite and have some fun!

Controller Support! Kinda!

Control Remapping with support for controller buttons, but not the analog sticks. So if you can find a work around you like, go for it! (Personally, I like steering on bumpers and acceleration/brake on triggers.)

Future Updates!

As you can see, there are some Under Construction Signs floating around in here. That's because there's still some stuff that I want to get done, but I just didn't have the time to do it! Check out @madlobotanist on Twitter, I'll let you know whenever I add something, and if there's anything you want to see added, maybe leave a comment down below! I'll see what I can do!

As always, if you have any issues, questions, comments, concerns, or just want to chat, you can reach me @madlobotanist on Twitter! And if you don't already, listen to the Cool Kids Table, which you can find on iTunes and other podcast services (Their Twitter is @CKTcast)!!

DEFAULT CONTROLS

PLAYER 1 (who controls the main menu, level select, and the pause menu)

Left/Turn Left - A

Right/Turn Right - D

Up - W

Down - S

Accelerate - W

Brake - S

Drift/Select/Deselect - Space

Pause - Escape

Reset Kart - R

PLAYER 2

Left/Turn Left - Left Arrow

Right/Turn Right - Right Arrow

Up - Up Arrow

Down - Down Arrow

Accelerate - Up Arrow

Brake - Down Arrow

Drift/Select/Deselect - Right CTRL

Pause - Keypad Enter

Reset Kart - Keypad 0

PLAYER 3

Left/Turn Left - J

Right/Turn Right - L

Up - I

Down - K

Accelerate - I

Brake - K

Drift/Select/Deselect - M

Pause - P

Reset Kart - O

PLAYER 4

Left/Turn Left - Keypad 4

Right/Turn Right - Keypad 6

Up - Keypad 8

Down - Keypad 5

Accelerate - Keypad 8

Brake - Keypad 5

Drift/Select/Deselect - Keypad 1

Pause - Keypad Plus

Reset Kart - Keypad 9
